text: for folks who are working on arya trainings (lab, safety, kitchen, etc) can you give me a sense of how long (ballpark) you expect your trainings to take? 15 min? 1 hour? 1/2 day? trying to come up with a system for how we schedule these out for the studio over the first week or so
assuming some will be longer than others :slightly_smiling_face:
also <@U0ML49XU0> do you have a (rough) sense of how long we should plan for arya tours? (i think this is you)
it is me and liz though 0 progress has been made on it given some dependencies and also my understanding that it's a future phase (soon) initiative rather than a day 1 initiative. still accurate?
we’re thinking we’d want to provide employee tours on day 1 but maybe lower-fi than what you were tasked with (ill take a look at that spreadsheet to get a little more context)
josh is asking about the imac that’s currently in the brandlab wall that’s being disassembled
not sure who should own where that goes, but should probably live in photo room or an open desk? open question
i always thought it would live in the photo room fwiw
i believe that’s <@U3M4RRNQ5> , no?
yea he should run, i'll contribute
rad, just wanna make sure right folks have visibility. thanks all!

nah, uncorked has one

and if so, i believe it needs to be reformatted
ah makes sense
